title: Opie's Home
overview: The live-action preschoool series Hi Opie! is getting a spin-off.The new live-action series follows four-year-old puppet Opie as he explores new things in and around his home. Opie, who was designed and built by Jim Henson's Creature Shop, is once again voiced and operated by puppeteer Jordan Lockhart. The series will also feature veteran Canadian actor Graham Greene as Opie's next door neighbour Mr. Kabashio.
